post.author: Admin
post.title: Band Fest
post.description:
Hi Everyone,
We only have a few days left before the Festival of Bands where we will get our first
post.content:
Hi Everyone,

We only have a few days left before the Festival of Bands where we will get our first glimpse of our contest show: Moonlight Reflections. I have been watching the Wednesday night practices, and the show is amazing - an evening of entertainment for everyone.

Thank you to everyone that has responded to our request for help! We are almost there but we need of a few more volunteers to:

Usher:

Our ushers help direct the bands to their location in our stands and stop the flow of guests into the seats during each school’s performance. This is a fun job! You will be able to see every marching band perform.

Easter Seals:

A few spots are open to ‘man’ the truck. Bring a book, relax and load the bags into the truck. Shifts are short - only 1 1/2 hours.

Please consider helping us out to make this event a huge success for our hard working NRHS Marching Band.

To volunteer, click on this link.

Please contact Amanda Kost at 440-864-6543 with any of your volunteer questions.

Thanks,

Amanda Kost
Band Booster Vice-President
